BadgeDetail.Name: Suspension I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of suspension systems. They can inspect dampers for leaks and springs for missing coils. They are also able to measure a vehicle's ride height and replace a rear damper.

Task.Title: Inspect
Task.Body: Upload evidence inspecing dampers for leaks and springs for missing coils
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence inspecing dampers for leaks and springs for missing coils
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence inspecing dampers for leaks and springs for missing coils

Task.Title: Ride height
Task.Body: Upload evidence measuring a vehicle's ride height and replacing a rear damper.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence measuring a vehicle's ride height and replacing a rear damper.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence measuring a vehicle's ride height and replacing a rear damper.
